column2: description=Long, narrow body of water surrounded by marshes

column1: '''Linaewen''' was a long, narrow lake within the vast marshland of reeds and pools that formed the [[Marshes of Nevrast]], which were in the eastern lowlands of the country of [[Nevrast]].<ref>{{S
column2: Map}}</ref>  The margins of Linaewen abounded with wading birds of every kind.<ref>{{S
column3: Beleriand}}</ref> It was from these birds that it took its name: ''Linaewen'' is [[Elvish]] for "lake of birds".<ref>{{S

column1: It has been suggested{{who}} that ''Linaewen'' is a [[Sindarin]] name, composed of ''[[lin]]'' ("pool, mere") + ''[[aew]]'' ("bird") + ''[[en]]'' (adjective suffix).<ref>{{webcite
